overview:
Internationally recognized authority on Marketing Strategy and Business Development offering more than 22 years of executive management, operations, and consulting experience. He has served as an Executive Officer in a number of leading publicly traded corporations and he is well known for consistently identifying, developing and implementing value-added strategies that typically lead to significant operational and cost efficiencies.

Specialties: Extensive experience in entrepreneurial businesses and has been instrumental in the vision and development of innovative programs geared to assist entrepreneurs in obtaining a better understanding in the establishment and organization of business opportunities both in Israel and abroad.
